game_settings.title: Game settings
game_settings.how_to_play_desc: A question with two options will appear. Each player votes, then results are shown and discussion starts!

category_page.title: Choose categories
category_page.subtitle: You can pick more than one!

game.exit_message: You will see the session summary.

summary.title: Session summary
summary.no_votes_hint: No voting data in this session.
summary.no_votes_card: That was a quick session. Play another round to discover group insights.
summary.split_evenly: You were split exactly in half.
summary.full_agreement: Perfect alignment! You were exceptionally unanimous in this session.
summary.all_categories_similar: Across all categories, your agreement level was similar.
